overview.heading: Henderson Virtual Office
overview.body: Experience the benefits of having an esteemed business address in Henderson without the complexities and financial obligations of a traditional office setup. Opus VO affords you the prestige of a top-tier business location in Henderson at a substantially reduced cost. Manage your business correspondence, greet clients, and host meetings in our modern, fully-equipped conference rooms. Boost your corporate identity with an elite address in one of Henderson’s central business districts.  Opting for a virtual office in Henderson via Opus VO grants you the added perk of a live receptionist, delivering a customized, high-touch service experience for your clients. Each interaction is uniquely tailored to fulfill your business needs, all while supported by our array of superior administrative services, including complete mail management, advanced call forwarding, and more. Free up your time to focus on strategic growth as our dedicated administrative staff handles your day-to-day operational tasks.

faqs.question: Can I receive mail under my company name and personal name?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can receive mail under both once your account has been activated.

faqs.question: Do you use an automated phone service or a receptionist to answer?
faqs.answer: We offer a live, personalized receptionist to transfer your calls during business hours Monday to Friday. Calls made after hours will be met with a professional voicemail.

faqs.question: Can I have a virtual office in Henderson, Nevada even if I don’t reside there?
faqs.answer: Yes, and it is a fantastic way to expand your presence to new clients. It will build trust with residents by having your business in the heart of Henderson. You can also adapt to better meet your clients’ unique needs within Nevada.

faqs.question: What do you mean by “all-inclusive services”?
faqs.answer: Our Henderson virtual office offerings include all features listed at the same monthly cost, regardless of the location you choose. Please note that mail centers and some premium locations may not include all options. If you would like additional information, you can compare Opus to our competitors or contact us.

sections.title: Why Choose a Henderson Virtual Office?
sections.body: Henderson isn’t merely a suburb of Las Vegas; it’s an economic hotspot in its own right, with industries ranging from hospitality to advanced manufacturing. Align your business with this growing market and seize local opportunities that can make a significant impact on your revenue stream. Our Henderson location is strategically situated near essential business centers and event venues, granting you effortless access to valuable networking and industry events.  By selecting an Opus Virtual Office in Henderson, you set your business on a trajectory for success, all at a fraction of the cost of a traditional office space. Take your business to the next level by embracing this innovative office solution today.  Opus VO, Henderson @ 3535 Executive Terminal Drive, Henderson, NV 89052
